text: Georgy Mshvenieradze (born 12 August 1960, in Tbilisi, Georgian SSR) was a Soviet water polo player. His father Peter was the captain of the USSR team throughout the 1950s and appeared at three Olympic Games. Georgy and his brother Nugzar followed their father into the sport. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Giorgi Mshvenieradze
